title: Still a Lady: Clarity, Love, and Light during a Global Pandemic
description: Still a Lady takes the reader on an introspective journey of self-love, romance, overcoming hardship, and self-empowerment.   Through Monica El’s poetic advocacy, she offers support, encouragement, and inspiration with the power of the written word. Moreover, these poems serve as an affirmation of one’s true self and a reminder than authenticity and vulnerability are not to be avoided, but embraced. By book’s end, each reader will be instilled with an unwavering sense of courage to turn their dreams into reality, even in the face of a global pandemic.
author: Monica El
